question: What is Hakach Transfer?
answer: Hakach Transfer offers an easy-to-use platform, ensuring faster payments and money transfers with reduced fees, and ensures 100% secure transactions.

question: How many currencies can I transfer money to?
answer: Send money to your friends and family with confidence. More than 180 countries and 30 currencies supported by Hakach Transfer.

question: How can I download the Hakach app?
answer: You can download the Hakach app from the Google Play Store or Apple App Store by searching for 'Hakach'.

question: Is Hakach available on iOS and Android?
answer: Yes, Hakach is available on both platforms. Download the app from the Play Store for Android or the App Store for iOS.

question: How can I register on Hakach?
answer: To register, download the app, open it and follow the instructions to create an account by providing your phone number and other necessary information.

question: How can I verify my Hakach account?
answer: After registration, you will receive a verification code by SMS. Enter this code in the app to verify your account.

question: How can I reset my Hakach password?
answer: If you forgot your password, use the 'Forgot password' option on the login screen to receive a reset link by email.

question: What documents are needed to register?
answer: You will need a valid phone number, email address, and, depending on your country, an ID or other personal information to verify your identity.

question: Is Hakach Transfer free?
answer: Registration and account creation are free. No fees are deducted for registration.

question: What operations can I perform on Hakach Transfer?
answer: On our mobile app or on the Hakach website, you can send money to Africa, receive, check the exchange rate directly, or even make a transfer to yourself.

question: How can I send money with Hakach?
answer: To send money, open the app, click on the 'Send money' option, enter the amount and fill in the recipient's information, then confirm the transfer.

question: Is Hakach secure?
answer: Yes. Hakach uses modern encryption and compliance standards to ensure the security of your transactions.

question: Which countries are supported by Hakach?
answer: Currently, Hakach supports several countries in Africa such as Niger, Benin, Togo, Cameroon, etc. You can see the complete list on our app.

question: How long does a transfer take?
answer: Transfers are generally processed instantly, but depending on the country and method, it may take a few moments.

question: What are the fees for a transfer?
answer: Fees vary depending on the amount and country. The app displays the fees before each sending.

question: Can I receive money directly in my bank account?
answer: Yes. Recipients can receive money in their mobile account, bank account or direct withdrawal depending on their country.

question: My transfer failed, what should I do?
answer: If a transfer fails, check your transaction. Otherwise, contact our support via WhatsApp or email.

question: What can I do if I have a problem?
answer: You can contact our support team by email or WhatsApp for quick assistance.

question: How can I cancel a transfer?
answer: To cancel a transfer, go to the transaction history, select the transfer and choose the cancellation option if available or contact our customer service directly.

question: How can I update my personal information?
answer: To update your personal information, go to your account settings and modify the necessary information.

question: How can I contact customer support?
answer: You can contact our customer support via WhatsApp or by email at our email address.

question: What guarantees the reliability of Hakach Transfer?
answer: We are licensed by FINTRAC in Canada and registered with regulators such as the National Financial Information Processing Unit of Benin (CENTIF) and the FinTech Knowledge and Monitoring Office (BCSF) of BCEAO

question: Is the Hakach website only dedicated to transactions?
answer: No, on the Hakach website, you can also find information about our services, supported countries, tips or useful information that help you avoid online fraud.

question: How can I protect myself against online fraud?
answer: To protect yourself against fraud, never share your account information, use strong passwords, and always verify the authenticity of transfer requests.

question: How can I stay updated on Hakach news?
answer: To stay informed of the latest Hakach news and updates, follow us on our social networks. We regularly publish information about our services, promotions and many new features via WhatsApp or Push Notifications.

question: Is Hakach Transfer dependent on other actors, or in partnership with other actors?
answer: Yes, Hakach Transfer collaborates with local and international partners to ensure fast and secure money transfers. We work with banks and mobile operators to facilitate transactions. In partnership with many payment aggregators and mobile money operators, we offer seamless money transfer services, promoting financial inclusion and supporting the digital transformation of financial services.

question: Is Hakach Transfer a peer-to-peer money transfer service?
answer: Yes, Hakach Transfer allows users to send money directly to other people, whether for personal or professional payments, safely and quickly.

question: Does Hakach Transfer offer loans or credit?
answer: No, Hakach Transfer does not offer loan, credit or financing services. Our activity is exclusively focused on secure money transfer.

question: Can I buy or sell cryptocurrencies with Hakach Transfer?
answer: No. Hakach Transfer does not support cryptocurrency transactions. We only process official currencies, in a secure and regulated framework.

question: Is Hakach Transfer a bank?
answer: No, Hakach Transfer is not a bank. We are a financial services provider that collaborates with licensed institutions to facilitate money transfers.

question: Can I pay bills or make online purchases via Hakach Transfer?
answer: Not at the moment. Hakach Transfer is currently dedicated to money transfers between individuals. Bill payment could be added in the future.

question: Does Hakach Transfer use informal or illegal systems?
answer: Absolutely not. Hakach Transfer complies with all legal and regulatory standards. We only operate with verified and reliable financial partners.

question: Does Hakach Transfer keep customer money?
answer: No. Hakach Transfer does not hold your money. Transfers are processed immediately through our licensed partners. We do not function as a deposit account.

question: Can money be transferred for illegal purposes via Hakach Transfer?
answer: No. Any attempt at illegal use (fraud, laundering, prohibited financing) is blocked. Hakach Transfer applies strict controls to ensure compliance.

question: Can I send money without providing identification?
answer: No. To comply with anti-money laundering laws, valid identification is always required when transferring with Hakach Transfer.

question: Does Hakach Transfer operate outside regulatory hours?
answer: No. Although our platforms are accessible 24/7, operations are validated according to the hours authorized by partner institutions.

question: Do you provide currency exchange or foreign currency services?
answer: Yes. Absolutely, Hakach Transfer provides currency exchange services. Our transactions are carried out in the currencies supported by our partner countries.

question: How can I check the status of my transfer with Hakach Transfer?
answer: Once your transfer is made, you receive a receipt from which you can track the status of your transfer. When the transaction is completed you will also receive a message via WhatsApp.

question: What to do if my transfer takes longer than expected?
answer: If your transfer is pending or taking longer than usual, first check that you have not made a transfer by mistake or if all the information you entered is correct. If everything is ok, contact our customer service. Our teams will immediately check the status of the transaction and keep you informed.
